t: To the chief Musician{H5329}{H8764)} on Neginoth{H5058}, A Psalm{H4210} or Song{H7892} of Asaph{H623}. In Judah{H3063} is God{H430} known{H3045}{H8737)}: his name{H8034} is great{H1419} in Israel{H3478}.
In Salem{H8004} also is his tabernacle{H5520}, and his dwelling place{H4585} in Zion{H6726}.
There brake{H7665}{H8765)} he the arrows{H7565} of the bow{H7198}, the shield{H4043}, and the sword{H2719}, and the battle{H4421}. Selah{H5542}.
Thou art more glorious{H215}{H8737)} and excellent{H117} than the mountains{H2042} of prey{H2964}.
The stouthearted{H47}{H3820} are spoiled{H7997}{H8709)}, they have slept{H5123}{H8804)} their sleep{H8142}: and none of the men{H582} of might{H2428} have found{H4672}{H8804)} their hands{H3027}.
At thy rebuke{H1606}, O God{H430} of Jacob{H3290}, both the chariot{H7393} and horse{H5483} are cast into a dead sleep{H7290}{H8737)}.
Thou, even thou, art to be feared{H3372}{H8737)}: and who may stand{H5975}{H8799)} in thy sight{H6440} when{H227} once thou art angry{H639}?
Thou didst cause judgment{H1779} to be heard{H8085}{H8689)} from heaven{H8064}; the earth{H776} feared{H3372}{H8804)}, and was still{H8252}{H8804)},
When God{H430} arose{H6965}{H8800)} to judgment{H4941}, to save{H3467}{H8687)} all the meek{H6035} of the earth{H776}. Selah{H5542}.
Surely the wrath{H2534} of man{H120} shall praise{H3034}{H8686)} thee: the remainder{H7611} of wrath{H2534} shalt thou restrain{H2296}{H8799)}.
Vow{H5087}{H8798)}, and pay{H7999}{H8761)} unto the LORD{H3068} your God{H430}: let all that be round about{H5439} him bring{H2986}{H8686)} presents{H7862} unto him that ought to be feared{H4172}.
He shall cut off{H1219}{H8799)} the spirit{H7307} of princes{H5057}: he is terrible{H3372}{H8737)} to the kings{H4428} of the earth{H776}.
